page.title: 07WILTON MOOR
page.content: Most of the land in this square is {scrubland}.There are two{plantations } which are both coniferous,one is called{Harrisons Plantation}and the other is{Far Moor Plantation.}There are some fields which are used for grazing{Freisian cows.}The fields belong to{High Barnaby Farm}which is being sold at the moment.There is a field with barley and next to that one another has{oil seed rape}in it. There are some fields with{pigs}in.The pigs are{crossbred}saddleback, landrace and large white. There are some remains of{Pittop village.}There used to be two rows of{houses,}a{shop} and a{chapel.}The{miners}used to live there.The pit is still there but blocked up.
